BANNER.TITLE: Making Wise Decisions Easy
BANNER.DESCRIPTION: Singapore’s 1st Bionic Financial Adviser where human wisdom and technology come together to deliver best-in-class financial advice that integrates national schemes.

INSURANCE.LABEL: Insure
INSURANCE.TITLE: Get Insurance You Really Need
INSURANCE.DESCRIPTION: Analyse your insurance coverage and compare insurance easily. Receive claims support and enjoy up to 50% rebate in agent’s commissions!
INSURANCE.LINK2: Or I Know What I Need!

WILL.LABEL: Wills
WILL.TITLE: Will Writing Online, Anytime and Anywhere!
WILL.DESCRIPTION: Protect and provide for your loved ones even after you pass on. Write a legally binding, simple will in just 10 minutes!

INVESTMENT.LABEL: Invest
INVESTMENT.TITLE: Invest With Confidence
INVESTMENT.DESCRIPTION: Feel confident about investing even as a beginner! Get access to low-cost and best-in-class globally diversified investments at your fingertips!

COMPREHENSIVE.LABEL: Comprehensive
COMPREHENSIVE.TITLE: Comprehensive Financial Planning
COMPREHENSIVE.DESCRIPTION: Are you financially healthy? Get a holistic financial assessment and trusted financial advice integrated with CPF and other national schemes to reach your goals!

NEWSLETTER.TITLE: Join our newsletter and get wiser every day!
NEWSLETTER.SUBTEXT: Get exclusive access to promotions, personal finance tips and updates on the latest news. Don’t miss out!

TRUSTED.TITLE: The Trusted Place to be insured

REVIEW2.MESSAGE: "Good service, clear cut, staff is approachable and is able to answer queries within a day."

REVIEW3.MESSAGE: "Dennis Hoe is very professional. He explained every clause of the policy and answer my questions well. Thank you for going the extra mile."
